data.author: Bloomberg
data.title: Paramount’s $54 billion debt plays a starring role in Warner bid
data.description: Paramount has a temporary financing package in place for the combined company, but it hasn’t locked in a maximum rate on more permanent borrowings for the transaction
data.content: Even if Paramount Skydance Corp. manages to take over Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. against the companys will, it faces another high hurdle: coping with the colossal $54 billion of debt its planning to… [+6024 chars]

data.author: Jennifer A. Dlouhy, Bloomberg
data.title: Trump names Warsh, Hassett as top Fed contenders, WSJ says
data.description: “I think the two Kevins are great,” he said. “I think there are a couple of other people that are great.”
data.content: President Donald Trump said that Kevin Hassett and Kevin Warsh are his top choices to lead the US Federal Reserve and that he expects the next chair of the central bank to consult with him on interes… [+1947 chars]
